ingredients.ingredient: 10 pounds potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 (1 1/4 pound) loaf of white bread, torn into pieces, or as desired - divided

cookingTips: Cut potatoes into uniform pieces so they cook evenly and reach tender consistency together
Sauté onions and celery in butter until soft before combining with potatoes for deep flavor
Add milk gradually while mashing to achieve desired creamy consistency without making filling too wet
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you build layers of flavor with caramelized vegetables before adding the potatoes?
